Writer: Rich Wilkes (based on characters created by), F. Scott Frazier
Language: English, Spanish, Portuguese, Mandarin, Tagalog, Russian
Title: xXx: Return of Xander Cage
Actors: Vin Diesel, Donnie Yen, Deepika Padukone, Kris Wu
Plot: Xander Cage is left for dead after an incident, though he secretly returns to action for a new, tough assignment with his handler Augustus Gibbons.
